name: Septiny
description:
Septiny is a 2D Rage Platformer game where the goal is to beat 3 levels in under 7.777 seconds. The twist? Whenever you beat all three levels, you end up replaying a slightly different (and harder) version of them, up to 7 times. The game keeps track of your time, so try and beat other players times!

Controls: AD/Arrow Keys to move. Spacebar/W to Jump. M to mute audio, Escape to quit.

The game was made by me, Gabriel Russell. The music was provided by Arcane Toaster for use in this game jam.

This game uses the following art assets:

Kyrise: "Free 16x16 RPG Icon Pack"

Pixel Frog: "Pixel Adventure 1"

Pixel Frog: "Pixel Adventure 2"
